last_episode_to_air.name: The Secret Keeper
last_episode_to_air.overview: Olivier is taken out of her cell to help with a cold case in 2021, but her motives are unclear. After Fourniret's death, can she recover her humanity?

name: Monique Olivier: Accessory to Evil
original_name: L'Affaire Fourniret : Dans la tête de Monique Olivier
overview: From 1987 to 2003, Michel Fourniret cemented his legacy as France’s most infamous murderer. But his wife was an enigma: Was she a pawn or a participant?

episodes.name: The Monster's Wife
episodes.overview: June, 2003. Belgian authorities arrest Michel Fourniret for attempted kidnapping and assault. Linking him to two other cases, they interrogate his wife.

episodes.name: Deal with the Devil
episodes.overview: Letters, loneliness and a deadly pact: With Olivier in custody, psychologists analyze her history with Fourniret to understand her role in his crimes.

episodes.name: The Ogres of the Ardennes
episodes.overview: A prosecutor recalls Olivier and Fourniret's sheer lack of empathy as they uncovered bodies. Later, their ownership of a château is called into question.

episodes.name: The Evil Genius
episodes.overview: When the trial opens, Olivier's role as a mother spikes public fascination — and hatred. As the couple's crimes come to light, so does their sex life.

episodes.name: The Secret Keeper
episodes.overview: Olivier is taken out of her cell to help with a cold case in 2021, but her motives are unclear. After Fourniret's death, can she recover her humanity?
